name: Tax Planning and Strategy
description: This department focuses on developing proactive tax strategies to minimize tax liabilities while ensuring compliance. It involves analyzing complex tax laws and regulations to identify opportunities for tax savings and optimize financial decisions for both individuals and businesses.

name: International Tax Services
description: Specializing in cross-border taxation issues, this area helps multinational corporations navigate the complexities of global tax regulations. It addresses transfer pricing, foreign tax credits, and treaty interpretation to ensure compliance and maximize tax efficiency across multiple jurisdictions.

name: State and Local Tax (SALT) Compliance
description: This department manages the intricate web of state and local tax obligations, including sales and use taxes, property taxes, and income taxes across various jurisdictions. It helps businesses understand and meet their multi-state tax responsibilities while identifying potential tax savings opportunities.

name: Tax Technology and Automation
description: Focused on leveraging cutting-edge technology to streamline tax processes, this area develops and implements tax-specific software solutions. It aims to enhance accuracy, reduce manual work, and improve overall efficiency in tax data management and reporting.

name: Tax Controversy and Dispute Resolution
description: This specialized department handles tax audits, appeals, and litigation with tax authorities. It provides expert representation and negotiation services to resolve tax disputes, minimize penalties, and protect clients' interests in complex tax matters.

name: Tax Credits and Incentives
description: Dedicated to identifying and securing tax credits and incentives offered by various government entities, this area helps businesses maximize their tax benefits. It involves researching available programs, preparing documentation, and ensuring compliance with specific credit requirements.

name: Estate and Gift Tax Planning
description: This department focuses on developing strategies to minimize estate and gift taxes for high-net-worth individuals and families. It involves complex wealth transfer planning, trust structuring, and charitable giving strategies to optimize tax outcomes across generations.

name: Tax-Exempt Organizations
description: Specializing in the unique tax requirements of non-profit organizations, this area ensures compliance with tax-exempt status regulations. It addresses issues such as unrelated business income, public charity status, and private foundation rules.

name: Tax Provision and ASC 740 Services
description: This department focuses on the complex area of accounting for income taxes under ASC 740 (formerly FAS 109). It helps companies accurately calculate and report their tax provisions, manage effective tax rates, and navigate the intricacies of financial statement tax disclosures.

name: Mergers and Acquisitions Tax
description: This specialized area provides tax due diligence, structuring advice, and post-merger integration services for M&A transactions. It helps identify tax risks and opportunities, optimize deal structures, and ensure smooth tax transitions during corporate restructurings.

name: Tax Policy Analysis and Advocacy
description: This department monitors and analyzes proposed tax legislation and regulations, assessing their potential impact on clients and industries. It also engages in advocacy efforts to influence tax policy decisions and represent client interests in the legislative process.

name: Expatriate Tax Services
description: Focusing on the unique tax challenges faced by globally mobile employees, this area helps manage complex international tax obligations. It addresses issues such as tax equalization, foreign earned income exclusion, and treaty benefits for expatriates and their employers.
